title: And I will
notes:
And I will make of you a great nation, and I will bless you and make your name great, so that you will be a blessing. (Gensis 12:2)
我必叫你成為大國。我必賜福給你，叫你的名為大；你也要叫別人得福。(創12:2)

title: The Blessing
author: Kari Jobe, Cody Carnes Steven Furtick, Chris Brown
copyright: 2020 Music by Elevation Worship Publishing, Capitol CMG Paragon / Writers Roof Publishing, Worship Together Music / Kari Jobe Carnes Music
lyrics_raw:
<1>
[G]The Lord bless you
[Cadd9]And keep you
[G]Make His face shine [D]upon you
And be gracious to you
[region 2]
主賜福 保護你
使祂的臉 光照你 賜恩典給你
</1>
<2>
[Em]The Lord turn His
[Cadd9]Face toward you
And [G]give you [D]peace
[region 2]
願主向 你仰臉
賜你平安
</2>
<chorus>
[Em]A-[Cadd9]men, a-[G]men, a-[D]men
[Em]A-[Cadd9]men, a-[G]men, a-[D]men
[region 2]
阿們  阿們  阿們 
阿們  阿們  阿們 
</chorus>
<bridge>
May His [Em]favor be upon you
And a [Cadd9]thousand generations
And your [G]family and your children
And their [D]children, and their children
[region 2]
願祂恩寵 在你身上
祂的慈愛 直到千代
在你家庭 和你兒女
和他後代 直到萬代
</bridge>
<bridge2>
May His [Em]presence go before you
And be[Cadd9]hind you, and beside you
All a[G]round you, and within you
He is [D]with you, He is [D]with you
[region 2]
願祂同在 在你前頭
在你身後 在你左右
在你周圍 在你裡面
與你同在 與你同在
</bridge2>
<bridge3>
In the [Em]morning, in the evening
In your [Cadd9]coming, and your going
In your [G]weeping, and rejoicing
He is [D]for you, He is [D]for you
[region 2]
或是清晨 或是夜裡
或是你出 或是你入
或是流淚 或是歡欣
祂幫助你 祂幫助你
</bridge3>
<tag>
He is [Em]for you, He is for you
He is [Cadd9]for you, He is for you
He is [G]for you, He is for you
He is [D]for you, He is for you
[region 2]
祂幫助你 祂幫助你
祂幫助你 祂幫助你
祂幫助你 祂幫助你
</tag>

title: 你起來唱歌
author: papachen
lyrics_raw:
<1>
[G]你起來唱[D]歌 (讚美祂)
[G]你起來唱[C]歌 (讚美祂)
[G]你起來讚[C]美唱[A7]歌
[D]大聲講哈利路亞[G]
[region 2]
lí khí-lâi tshiùnn-kua (o-ló i)
lí khí-lâi tshiùnn-kua (o-ló i)
lí khí-lâi o-ló tshiùnn-kua
tuā-siann kóng Hallelujah
</1>
<2>
[G]你起來跳[D]舞 (感謝祂)
[G]你起來跳[D]舞 (感謝祂)
[G]你起來感[C]謝跳[A7]舞
[D]大聲講哈利路亞[G]
[region 2]
lí khí-lâi thiàu-bú (kám-siā i)
lí khí-lâi thiàu-bú (kám-siā i)
lí khí-lâi kám-siā thiàu-bú
tuā-siann kóng Hallelujah
</2>
<3>
[G]你舉起雙[D]手 (高舉祂)
[G]你舉起雙[D]手 (高舉祂)
[G]你起來舉[C]起雙[A7]手
[D]大聲講哈利路亞[G]
[region 2]
lí gia̍h-khí siang-tshiú (ko-kúo i)
lí gia̍h-khí siang-tshiú (ko-kúo i)
lí khí-lâi gia̍h-khí siang-tshiú
tuā-siann kóng Hallelujah
</3>
<chorus>
我欲唱[G]歌來讚美[Am]祂
我欲跳[C]舞來感謝[D]祂
我欲起[G]來舉雙手[C]高舉[A7]祂
[D]大聲講哈利路亞[G]
[region 2]
guá beh tshiùnn-kua lâi o-ló i
guá beh thiàu-bú lâi kám-siā i
guá beh khí-lâi gia̍h siang-tshiú ko-kúo i
tuā-siann kóng Hallelujah
</chorus>

title:
[1]
Let ea
notes:
[1]
Let each of you look not only to his own interests, but also to the interests of others. Have this mind among yourselves, which is yours in Christ Jesus. (Philippians 2:4-5)
[region 2]
腓 2:4-5 你們當以基督耶穌的心為心：
各人不要單顧自己的事，也要顧別人的事。

title: Be Thou My Vision
author: Eleanor H. Hull
lyrics_raw:
<1>
[D]Be thou my [Bm]vision, O [G]Lord of my [D]heart
[A]Naught be all else to me, [G]save that Thou [A]Art
[Bm]Thou my best [G]thought, by [D]day or by [G/A]night
[D]Waking or [Bm]sleeping, Thy [G]presence my [D]light
[Region 2]
主作我異象 作我心主宰
此世間只有祢  是我所愛
暝日我心神 思念祢無停
祢做我光燈  互我有光明
</1>
<2>
[D]Be Thou my [Bm]wisdom, and [G]Thou my true [D]word
[A]I ever with Thee and [G]Thou with me, [A]Lord
[Bm]Thou my great [G]Father, and [D]I Thy true [G/A]son
[D]Thou in me [Bm]dwelling and [G]I with Thee [D]one
[Region 2]
主做我智慧   作我的真道
永與我同在  指示復保護
祢是我天父  我作祢的子
祢及我居起  我與祢同行
</2>
<3>
[D]Riches I heed [Bm]not, nor [G]man’s empty [D]praise
[A]Thou mine Inheritance, [G]now and al[A]ways
[Bm]Thou and Thou [G]only, [D]first in my [G/A]heart
[D]High King of [Bm]Heaven, my [G]Treasure Thou [D]art
[Region 2]
錢財與名聲   我並無貪戀
祢做我產業  今日到永遠
我心只有祢  沒別項可比
天頂大君王  最寶貴是祢
</3>
<4>
[D]High King of [Bm]Heaven, my [G]victory [D]won
[A]May I reach Heaven’s joys, [G]O bright Heaven’s [A]Sun
[Bm]Heart of my [G]own heart, what[D]ever be[G/A]fall
[D]Still be my [Bm]Vision, O [G]Ruler of [D]all
[Region 2]
天頂大君王  助我常得勝
引導我進前  歡喜入天庭
無論何環境  主住我心內
永作我異象  萬物大主宰
</4>

content.origin_text:
Riches I heed not, nor man’s empty praise
Thou mine Inheritance, now and always
Thou and Thou only, first in my heart
High King of Heaven, my Treasure Thou art

content.region:
天頂大君王 助我常得勝
引導我進前 歡喜入天庭
無論何環境 主住我心內
永作我異象 萬物大主宰
content.origin_text:
High King of Heaven, my victory won
May I reach Heaven’s joys, O bright Heaven’s Sun
Heart of my own heart, whatever befall
Still be my Vision, O Ruler of all
